report.title: Moth Night list of all occurrences 2
report.description: A list of all occurrences. Includes a parameter for selecting survey.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM occurrences o JOIN samples s ON s.id = o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted = FALSE JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttlpref ON ttlpref.taxon_meaning_id = ttl.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlpref.preferred = 't' AND ttlpref.deleted = FALSE JOIN taxa tpref ON tpref.id = ttlpref.taxon_id AND tpref.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN taxa tcommon ON tcommon.id = ttlpref.common_taxon_id AND tcommon.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavQty ON oavQty.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavQty.occurrence_attribute_id = 64 AND oavQty.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavStg ON oavStg.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavStg.occurrence_attribute_id = 63 AND oavStg.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN list_termlists_terms lttStg ON lttStg.id = oavStg.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavMtd ON oavMtd.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavMtd.occurrence_attribute_id = 67 AND oavMtd.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN list_termlists_terms lttMtd ON lttMtd.id = oavMtd.int_value LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavRec ON oavRec.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavRec.occurrence_attribute_id = 65 AND oavRec.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oavDet ON oavDet.occurrence_id = o.id AND oavDet.occurrence_attribute_id = 66 AND oavDet.deleted = FALSE #joins# WHERE o.deleted = FALSE AND s.survey_id = #survey_id# #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id AS sample_id, o.id AS occurrence_id, o.record_status AS status, tpref.taxon, tcommon.taxon as common, oavQty.int_value AS quantity, lttMtd.term AS method, lttStg.term AS stage, oavRec.text_value AS recorder, oavDet.text_value AS determiner, o.comment

param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys
